explanation: Funds are required to be realigned to the Other Procurement, Army, 24/26, appropriation from Procurement of Ammunition, Army, 24/26, appropriation for the proper execution of the FY 2024 USCENTCOM Supplemental Spend Plan for the production of four Containerized Weapon System (CWS) - Advanced Precision Kill Weapon System (APK WS), (CWS-A) munition capability. The four CWS-A will be located in the USCENTCOM area of responsibility. This action does not change the purpose for which funds were originally appropriated. This is a Congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.
